findings.finding: Created Chief AI Officer role; CAIO reports to Chief Operating Officer focusing on outcomes rather than tools

quotes.text: For AI, the focus has to be on the outcomes, not on the tools.
quotes.speaker: Andrew Chin

findings.finding: Transitioned Chief Data Officer role to Chief AI Officer; CAIO reports to CTO

keyPeople.name: Ashok Srivastava
keyPeople.title: Chief AI Officer (formerly SVP and Chief Data Officer)

findings.finding: Appointed Chief AI Officer focused on product enhancement and team productivity

quotes.text: You don't really need a chief AI officer if you are only talking about AI making some changes for productivity.
quotes.speaker: Howie Xu

findings.finding: Hired Chief AI Officer; recruited from Google after 18+ years
Chief Data and Analytics Officer working with CIO on AI strategy (no dedicated CAIO)

quotes.text: This is not going to be once and done. We're going to continue to enhance our posture.
quotes.speaker: Rajesh Arora

findings.finding: Founder David Khuat-Duy shifted from CEO to Chief AI Officer; first objective was to deploy AI internally then take lessons to customers

keyPeople.name: David Khuat-Duy
keyPeople.title: Chief AI Officer (formerly CEO and Founder)

quotes.text: There's a lot of data categorization, storage, cleaning that needs to happen.
quotes.speaker: David Khuat-Duy

findings.finding: Appointed Chief AI Officer at beginning of 2025; CAIO serves as internal advocate for AI while guiding teams through regulations and ethics

quotes.text: Chief AI officers must also serve as internal advocates for AI while guiding teams through emerging regulations and ethical considerations.
quotes.speaker: Deepak Agarwal

findings.finding: CTO also serves as Chief AI Officer (combined role)
Hired former BharatPe Chief Data Officer as Chief AI Officer

keyPeople.name: Ritesh Mohan Srivastava
keyPeople.title: Chief AI Officer (formerly Chief Data Officer at BharatPe)

findings.finding: Created first Chief AI Officer role in public sector; CAIO oversees AI teams at Government Digital Service within DSIT, leads testing and scaling across government
Created first Chief AI Officer role; launched Elsa generative AI tool for employee efficiency
Chief AI Officer also serves as CIO; responsible for AI innovation and responsible use

industryStats.ibm2025: 26% of 2,300 organizations now have a CAIO, up from 11% two years earlier
industryStats.dataiq2025: 33.1% have appointed CAIO; 43.9% believe role should be created; 48% of FTSE 100 have CAIO or equivalent
industryStats.aws2026: 60% have established CAIO; additional 26% intend to do so in 2026
industryStats.fortune500Projection: Over 40% of Fortune 500 companies expected to have CAIO by end of 2026

roleEvolution.observation: CAIO role evolving from symbolic/exploratory (CAIO 1.0) to operational/consequential (CAIO 2.0)
roleEvolution.quote: The CAIO role is evolving from a symbolic appointment into something far more operational and consequential.

summary: Sweep found 15 CAIO appointments across private and public sectors. Key patterns: (1) Several firms transitioned existing CDO/data roles to CAIO rather than creating net-new positions (Intuit, Jindal Steel); (2) Some combined CAIO with existing C-suite roles like CTO or CIO (Dell, DHS); (3) Ivalua's founder moved from CEO to CAIOâ€”unusual structural signal of AI priority; (4) LinkedIn CAIO explicitly positioned as internal AI advocate + regulatory/ethics guide. Industry surveys show rapid adoption: 26-60% of organizations now have CAIO depending on methodology, with 40%+ of Fortune 500 expected by end of 2026. Government excluded from specimen candidates per project rules.
